title: Citi Expands Its Corporate Client Billing Network in Costa Rica via Strategic Partnership with Servimás
summary: San José, Costa Rica - Citi has established a new partnership in Costa Rica to expand its billing services network for corporate clients. Using the new network, payments can be made to Citi clients at Servimás's 65 branches around the country. Clients will also have access to an electronic tool to automatically reconcile their accounts and get real-time billing information, enjoying more efficient operations and significant savings.
tag-1: Citi Expands Its Corporate Client Billing Network in Costa Rica via Strategic Partnership with Servimás
tag-3: San José, Costa Rica – Citi has established a new partnership in Costa Rica to expand its billing services network for corporate clients. Using the new network, payments can be made to Citi clients at Servimás's 65 branches around the country. Clients will also have access to an electronic tool to automatically reconcile their accounts and get real-time billing information, enjoying more efficient operations and significant savings.
tag-4: "Adding more billing points for our corporate clients across the country has been a fundamental part of our strategy. With our new partner, our clients will have access to significantly more service outlets, and we are complementing this with an automatic solution that allows them to optimize their cash flow by reducing their Days Sales Outstanding (DSO), and, as a result, their Cash Conversion Cycle (CCC), immediately increasing our clients' liquidity. This is possible by improving and automatizing the entire account conciliation process in real time," said Mauricio Tarazona, Director of Treasury and Trade Solutions at Citi Costa Rica.
tag-5: The launch is part of Citi's regional growth strategy for its corporate billing services. With more than 18,000 points of service and 30 partnerships in the region, Servimás will contribute to improve service coverage by expanding Citi's geographic presence in key Latin American markets.
tag-6: Citi has one of the largest comprehensive corporate billing networks in Latin America, with a presence in 23 countries and its own network of more than 2,200 branches, in addition to partner networks that serve more than 13,800 corporate clients in the region.
tag-7: A main goal of these services is to provide fast and reliable payment information via a range of corporate billing channels and products. To this end, Citi is developing an innovative service to provide consolidated billing reports that provide information for all billing channels and products available in the country and the region.
tag-8: "Our partnership with Servimás strengthens Citi's billing services in Costa Rica, adding to our already strong network in Latin America, which offers one of the most comprehensive billing services in this market," commented Gustavo Casanovas, Managing Director Latin America Inflows Region Head at Citibank.
tag-9: Citi Citi, the leading global bank, has approximately 200 million customer accounts and does business in more than 160 countries and jurisdictions. Citi provides consumers, corporations, governments and institutions with a broad range of financial products and services, including consumer banking and credit, corporate and investment banking, securities brokerage, transaction services, and wealth management.
